name: バタガチャ！
description:
"BataGacha!" Is an enlightenment game to prevent the door from being forgotten.
The rule is simple, just keep closing the "door" flowing indefinitely according to the state.
Simple operability may be addictive enough to make you want to shut it all the way down.

If the door is open, press the "バタ!" Button and close the door.
If the door is closed, press the "ガチャ!" Button and close the key.
When the key is closed, press "オッケー!" Button to the next door.
If "ghost" appears when the door is open, the door will not close unless you press the "Butter!" Button twice.

* We will use packet communication only for net ranking and advertisement display.
